title: Book of Monsters - Halloween
description: 26 Halloween monsters from myth, movies and popular culture.Some some are evil, some are insane and others are just plain terrifying.Scary things that go bump in the night, re-imagined in a funky cartoon style.Featuring Dracula, The Mummy, Frankenstein, Bloody Mary, Zombies, Trolls. Werewolves and many more.With Large Images, a small amount of text, and a quiz at the end.Perfect for reluctant readers, monster fans and anybody wanting to scare themselves to sleep.WARNING: Not suitable for under 5's or easily frightened children.
author: Antony Briggs
